0: In a distant galaxy, an alien civilization has developed a technology that allows them to travel faster than the speed of light. This breakthrough has enabled them to explore new worlds and establish contact with other intelligent species. Their advanced spacecraft utilize a unique energy source, which remains a mystery to human scientists. This discovery opens up endless possibilities for intergalactic communication and cooperation.
1: What is the main idea of the paragraph?
(1) The mystery of the alien energy source.
(2) The alien civilization's faster-than-light travel technology.
